com.bazaarvoice
Class SubmissionParams

java.lang.Object
  com.bazaarvoice.BazaarParams
      com.bazaarvoice.SubmissionParams

public class SubmissionParams
extends BazaarParams

Handles the parameters for content submission.
Use of this class will rely on knowledge of the Bazaarvoice API. You should use this site as a reference for which parameters to pass using this class.

Created on 7/9/12. Copyright (c) 2012 BazaarVoice. All rights reserved.

Author:
Bazaarvoice Engineering

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPhotoCaptions()
Get the list of "PhotoCaption_<n>" parameters for this submission if any have been added.

Returns:
the list of captions

addPhotoCaption

public void addPhotoCaption(java.lang.String photoCaption)
Add a photo caption to the list of "PhotoCaption_<n>" parameters for this submission.

Usage:
For each photo added, the caption must be added in the same order. i.e.

addPhotoUrl(photo1);
addPhotoUrl(photo2);
addPhotoCaption(captionfor1);
addPhotoCaption(captionfor2);

Parameters:
photoCaption - a photo caption

getPhotoUrls

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPhotoUrls()
Get the list of "PhotoUrl_<n>" parameters for this submission if any have been added.

Returns:
the list of photo urls

addPhotoUrl

public void addPhotoUrl(java.lang.String photoUrl)
Add a photo url to the list of "PhotoUrl_<n>" parameters for this submission.

Parameters:
photoUrl - the url of a photo hosted by Bazaarvoice (uploaded though the API)

addVideoCaption

public void addVideoCaption(java.lang.String videoCaption)
Add a video caption to the list of "VideoCaption_<n>" parameters for this submission.

Usage:
For each video added, the caption must be added in the same order. i.e.

addVideoUrl(video1);
addVideoUrl(video2);
addVideoCaption(captionfor1);
addVideoCaption(captionfor2);

Parameters:
videoCaption - a video caption

Returns:
the list of video urls

addVideoUrl

public void addVideoUrl(java.lang.String videoUrl)
Add a video url to the list of "VideoUrl_<n>" parameters for this submission.

Parameters:
videoUrl - the url of a video hosted by either YouTube or Bazaarvoice (Uploaded through the API)

addTag

public void addTag(java.lang.String category,
                   java.lang.String tagName)
Add a new tag to the submission that is not specified in the configuration. The parameter will be of the form:
"tag__n=tagName".

Parameters:
category - the category that the new tag falls under
tagName - the name of the new tag

setTagIdSelected

public void setTagIdSelected(java.lang.String category,
                             java.lang.String name)
Add a parameter to show that a configuration predefined tag is selected. The parameter will be of the form:
"tagid_=true"

Parameters:
category - the category that the existing tag falls under
name - the name of the tag

toURL

public java.lang.String toURL(java.lang.String url)
Add the parameters set in this instance to the given url string.

Specified by:
toURL in class BazaarParams
Parameters:
url - the base url to append to
Returns:
the url with parameters
